title: Osama bin Laden
summary: Osama bin Mohammed bin Awad bin Laden[lower-alpha 1] (March 10, 1957[7] â€“ May 2, 2011[8]), also transliterated as Usama bin Ladin, was a Saudi Arabian terrorist and founder of the Pan-Islamic militant organization al-Qaeda. The group is designated as a terrorist group by the United Nations Security Council, the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO), the European Union, and various countries. Under bin Laden's leadership, al-Qaeda was responsible for, in addition to the September 11 attacks in the United States, many other mass-casualty attacks worldwide.[9][10][11]
